sub_fields.label: Content Post Type
sub_fields.name: content_post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select which type of post to feature

sub_fields.label: Items To Show
sub_fields.name: items_to_show
sub_fields.instructions: Select how many items the grid will display (if this number is less than the number of posts selected, the choice for which to display will be random)

sub_fields.label: Note:
sub_fields.message: With full-width featured display, only manual post selection is allowed

sub_fields.label: Show Premium Listings First?
sub_fields.name: show_premium_listings_first
sub_fields.instructions: If selected, the any Premium Listings that match the applied filters will appear first in the block

sub_fields.label: Select Link for "Show More"?
sub_fields.name: show_more_custom
sub_fields.instructions: By default, "Show More" will link to the archive page for post type

choices.default: Filter By Tag and Listing Type

sub_fields.label: Show Global This Weekend Events?
sub_fields.name: show_latest
sub_fields.instructions:
If checked, the block will pull from "This Weekend Events" under "Baltimore Options.
If not checked, user can manually select the events to populate this block.

sub_fields.label: Customize Code Block Width and Height?
sub_fields.name: customize_size

sub_fields.label: Code Block Width (px)
sub_fields.name: code_block_width
sub_fields.instructions: The maximum width is bound by the container.

sub_fields.label: Pre Title
sub_fields.name: pre_title
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, this will default to post "[Post Type] Spotlight"

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, this will default to post title.

sub_fields.label: Copy
sub_fields.name: copy
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, this will default to post excerpt

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, this will default to post hero background

sub_fields.label: CTA Link
sub_fields.name: cta_link
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, CTA button will link to spotlighted post

sub_fields.label: Show Featured Events Below?
sub_fields.name: show_featured_events
sub_fields.instructions: Select this to show featured events carousel/grid below the spotlight block

sub_fields.label: Featured Events Title
sub_fields.name: featured_events_title
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, title of section will read "Featured Events"
